Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 83rd overall pick, by New York (A) in 2010...
Released by New York (A) on 8/16/2011...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 8/16/2011 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Texas to Milwaukee on 2/8/2013 (Going to MIL: RF R. Golden. Going to TEX: P R. Nolasco, P C. Lee)...
Injured on 5/23/2013 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Traded from Milwaukee to Houston on 2/4/2014 (Going to MIL: P J. Gobble. Going to HOU: P J. Petties, RF R. Golden, RF K. Czerwinski)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/2016, off Gavin Floyd (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/19/2016, off Nick Hagadone (TEX)...
Released by Houston on 6/26/2021...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 6/26/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $714,286 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/27/2021, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/12/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $1,850,000 per year...
